name: On Your Left, No The Other!
name_original: On Your Left, No The Other!
description:
Test your skills on how fast you can shoot targets! milliseconds are important...

I'm going to add some updates that will make the game harder.

This is my first game that I published. I made it in 24 hours. (not for a game jam).

Thank you for testing my game. Comment if you have an idea to make this game better!

Sorry for the bad graphics and my English. (I didn't work on them)
